column4: Hey! i have kubuntu nicely set up on my mashine. But i wonder if there is an easy way to compile all the whole lot for my particular mashine. something like "apt-get everything i already have, compile, and install it" does anyone know?
any reason the interest in compiling everything?
just to see if there was a command to do it or see how long it takes or what?
like suggested, you may give gentoo a try
